name: Don't call the wizard a nerd (LD50)
name_original: Don't call the wizard a nerd (LD50)
description:
Submission for Ldum Dare 50

Made for the Jam, worked on it for about 10 hours total.

controls: 

  •  AD /Arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to jump

credits

  • music: freemusicarchive.org
  • sounds: freesound.org

Uh oh, the wizard got mad and now the kingdom is in ruin! Can you make it out the crumbling tower to escape the lava? (spoiler: no you can't)
